body:
Does the open beta for Legends of Runeterra include Mac functionality?

I mention this because tried downloading the game for the first release, and today (ready for the beta), and couldn't install it either time.
Ive been looking forward to this for a long time, and I'll be extremely disappointed if Mac users are shunned.

Available on "PC"  is a very vague statement, as PC can be both 'personal computer' as well as 'Windows'.

Does anyone have an answer to this?

replies.body: It would say "Available for PC and MAC" if it was.

Not necessarily, PC can mean either 'Computer' or 'Windows operating system'.
For example today's TFT video refers to the game as on PC, when it is also available on Mac.

For a game as big and as popular as league, there is no excuse for shafting a section of the player base.
